attributes.action: Make June 21 a bank holiday in the UK
attributes.additional_details: With all COVID restrictions coming to an end shortly, the British people deserve a day to enjoy their freedoms returning!
attributes.background: June 21 2021 to be made a bank holiday in the UK to celebrate the end of the pandemic

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action:https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/578730
